_guide_zh_1: 每个武器需要: id(注册ID), type(武器类型), displayName(显示名称), material(材质定义)
_guide_en_1: Each weapon needs: id (registry ID), type (weapon type), displayName, material (material definition)
_guide_zh_2: 武器类型(type)可选: hammer(战锤), spear(长矛), dagger(匕首), battleaxe(战斧), nunchaku(双截棍)
_guide_en_2: Available types: hammer, spear, dagger, battleaxe, nunchaku
_guide_zh_3: 材质(material)属性: name(名称), harvestLevel(挖掘等级), durability(耐久), efficiency(效率), damage(基础伤害), enchantability(附魔能力), repairItem(修复物品ID)
_guide_en_3: Material properties: name, harvestLevel, durability, efficiency, damage, enchantability, repairItem (item ID for repair)
_guide_zh_4: 可选属性: damageModifier(额外伤害加成), speedModifier(攻击速度加成)
_guide_en_4: Optional: damageModifier (extra damage), speedModifier (attack speed bonus)
_guide_zh_5: 注册名格式: mujmajnkraftsbettersurvival:itembstweaker_<材质名><武器类型>

weapons._example_zh: 示例: 炽铁双截棍 (使用暮色森林的烈焰锭)
weapons._example_en: Example: Fiery Iron Nunchaku (uses Twilight Forest Fiery Ingot)

weapons._example_zh: 示例: 钢叶双截棍 (使用暮色森林的钢叶锭)
weapons._example_en: Example: Steeleaf Nunchaku (uses Twilight Forest Steeleaf)
